data.text: @leepresents @celebrityradio @VirginAtlantic @richardbranson The new platform has a start date - as to when Virgin will ever get back actually answering their phones in a timely manner is very much a lottery!
@celebrityradio @VirginAtlantic @richardbranson On Friday the average wait time was 3 hours !!
@celebrityradio @VirginAtlantic @richardbranson Couldn’t agree more companies have got to stop using covid as an excuse to be shit now.

@celebrityradio @VirginAtlantic @richardbranson Won't go bust - will go begging for a bailout 
You've more patience than me, was the hold music any good
@bionic2603 @celebrityradio @VirginAtlantic @richardbranson Let's hope the Inland Revenue spot it 🤞
@celebrityradio @richardbranson Sorry for that! If we can ask you to send us a DM with your details and we can we will do our best to help. ^Phillip
@celebrityradio Why don’t you book BA first class like you did last time? You could use your air miles again too. 😉
